title: Highest graded N284 in the hobby for sale- Kelly SGC92

posts.post_title: Highest graded N284 in the hobby for sale- Kelly SGC92
posts.post_content:
Posted By: leon
To the best of my knowledge (someone correct me if I am wrong here) this is the highest graded Buchner Gold Coin card in the hobby. I don't know the PSA Registry numbers but the SGC ones are here: best acceptable offer cash/trade...A chance to own the unequivocal very best.


SGC..A..10..20..30..40..50..60..70..80..84..85..88..92..96..98..100
QTY..15.46..34..49..69..57..56..30..30..19..2...2...1..0..0..0..



[IMG]http://www.luckeycards.com/personaln284kellyfront.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.luckeycards.com/personaln284kellyback.jpg[/IMG]

edited typo and pricing change...

posts.post_content:

Leon - fantastic card.
Just checked the PSA pop report and only 2 PSA-8's were graded w/ none higher for the entire set.

1887 N284 GOLD COIN

posts.post_title: Highest graded N284 in the hobby for sale- Kelly SGC92
posts.post_content:
Posted By: leon
Thanks for the info...>This card was in an old SGC holder and when SGC crossed it to a newer one they said it warranted the grade again, as it fit the specs, and is the best one they have ever seen.....regards
